alert.note: Alert for St. Charles; St. John The Baptist (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 27 at 3:23AM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL ST. JOHN THE BAPTIST AND NORTHWESTERN ST. CHARLES PARISHES THROUGH 400 AM CST... At 323 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Edgard, or near Reserve, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Reserve, Laplace, Killona, Montz, Edgard, Garyville, and Wallace. This includes the following Interstates... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 202 and 213, and near mile marker 215. Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 1 and 8. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: St. Charles; St. John The Baptist
